description: View a list of existing campaigns using pagination, much like it appears in the standard user interface.
name: campaign_paginator

api_output.description: xml, json, or serialize (default is XML)

filter.description: The section filter that should be applied. This corresponds to a unique ID in the sectionfilter database table. Example: 11

limit.description: The amount of campaigns you wish to retrieve. Example: 10, 20, 50, 100

offset.description: The amount of records you want to skip over. This works in tandem with "limit." Example: 20, 50

sort.description: Leave empty for default sorting. Example: 01, 01D, 02, 02D, etc.
